mapper.sql: id, rid, uid, sort, mediaType, createTime, status, likeNum,content, mediaContent
mapper.select: select t.id, t.rid, t.uid, t.sort, t.mediaType, t.createTime, t.status, t.likeNum,t.content, t.mediaContent,c.name liveName, a.nickname reporter, '' thumbnail, ifnull(f.logo,a.headimgurl) headimgurl, ifnull(f.short_name,a.nickname) nickname, a.openid, b.id imgId, b.url, q.statement,q.createDate auditDate from live_rpt t left join live c on t.rid=c.id left join portal.userinfo a on t.uid=a.openid left join live_img b on t.id=b.rptId left join portal.users e on t.uid=e.openId left join portal.department f on e.department_id=f.department_id left join live_log q on t.lastAuditLogId=q.id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into live_rpt (id, rid, uid, sort, mediaType, createTime, status, likeNum, content, mediaContent) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mediaType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{likeNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{mediaContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT u.nickName, rpt.id, rpt.uid, rpt.rid FROM live.live_rpt rpt LEFT JOIN portal.userinfo u ON rpt.uid = u.openid WHERE rpt.rid = #{rid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rpt.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
